about_the_game:
As the sole specialist sent into a quarantined part of the Midwest , discover all you can about the mysterious corruption rapidly taking over. Utilize all you can find around you to survive the evolving area, find the source and eliminate the threat.

Build your base, craft your weapons and tools and learn to harness the corruption to create powerful upgrades in this horror survival game with sci-fi elements.

KEY FEATURES:

  • Choose your characters specialty and customize your character's appearance
  • Harvest natural resources to utilize as crafting materials
  • Hunt the wildlife still roaming the land as a food source
  • Learn to survive in any season of the year from the hot summer months to the frigid winter months
  • Gather materials to build up your base however you would like
  • Defend yourself against the invading corrupted forces however you choose; take the fight to them, sneak up on the enemy or fight from a distance
  • Craft powerful upgrade nodes to customize your character's skill set
  • Solve puzzles to restore power to the area and reach the most valuable of tools for survival

content_descriptors.notes: Game play contains graphic violence, blood and gore.
